translated: “When you become a human king, listen well and I will explain to you the Dharma discourse called ‘The King’s Practice of the Dharma.’

original: rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas yang dag par skye rgu rnams skyong bar byed pa gang gis phan pa dang bde ba la sbyar bar 'gyur ro; ;de'ang des rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas yang dag par skye rgu rnams skyong bar byed pa gang gis phan pa dang bde ba la sbyar bar 'gyur ro; ;de'ang des rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro //
translated: “The royal class, anointed on the crown of the head, who properly cares for living beings, will thereby be praised for bringing about their benefit and happiness.

original: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: And when their body disintegrates, they will go to the joyous higher realms and become the ruler of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: chos gang dag dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa'i rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi po nas dbang bskur bas skye rgu rnams skyong bar byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: chos gang dag dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa'i rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi po nas dbang bskur bas skye rgu rnams skyong bar byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: “What are the qualities that the royal class, anointed on the crown of the head, who cares for living beings, should possess?

original: mthong ba'i chos nyid la yang de des rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i chos nyid la yang de des rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be praised for it in this life.

original: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
translated: When their bodies give out, they will go to the higher realms and become rulers of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: rdzu 'phrul che ba dang stobs che ba dang nor che bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul che ba dang stobs che ba dang nor che bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have great magical power, great strength, and great wealth.

original: 'di na rgyal po chos sum cu rtsa lnga dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rgyal pos skye rgu rnams skyong bar byed la /
analyzed: 'di na rgyal po chos sum cu rtsa lnga dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rgyal pos skye rgu rnams skyong bar byed la /
translated: “Here, a king who is endowed with thirty-five qualities will rule over living beings.

original: skyong bar byed par gyur pas kyang nor chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyong bar byed par gyur pas kyang nor chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: By ruling in this way, he will become very wealthy.

original: stobs che ba dang phas kyi rgol ba'i dpung thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs che ba dang phas kyi rgol ba'i dpung thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will have great strength and will be invincible to any army of adversaries.

original: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: When his body gives out, he will go to the higher realms and become a ruler of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: sum cu @402b rtsa lnga po gang dag zhe na /
analyzed: sum cu @402b rtsa lnga po gang dag zhe na /
translated: What are these thirty-five qualities?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows.

original: 'di'i rang gi skye bo gtsang bar gyur ba dang / dpya rnams nges par byas nas za bar byed pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / lugs las phyogs 'dzin med pa dang / bla ma mchod par byed pa dang / sngar nyid ster bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: 'di'i rang gi skye bo gtsang bar gyur ba dang / dpya rnams nges par byas nas za bar byed pa dang / bzod pa dang ldan pa dang / lugs las phyogs 'dzin med pa dang / bla ma mchod par byed pa dang / sngar nyid ster bar byed pa yin /
translated: He is pure in his own conduct, and he eats only after he has paid his taxes. He is patient, and he does not take sides with the powerful. He honors his superiors and gives gifts in advance.

original: sngar byin par gyur nas phyis kyang ster bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: sngar byin par gyur nas phyis kyang ster bar byed pa yin /
translated: Having given something in the past, he gives it again in the future.

original: chos la yin pa 'dzin par mi byed pa yin /
analyzed: chos la yin pa 'dzin par mi byed pa yin /
translated: He does not hold on to the Dharma.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po dang sten par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po dang sten par byed pa ma yin /
translated: He does not associate with evil friends.

original: bud med kyi dbang du 'gro ba ma yin /
analyzed: bud med kyi dbang du 'gro ba ma yin /
translated: He is not under the control of women.

original: thams cad kyi tshig la dad par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshig la dad par byed pa ma yin /
translated: He does not believe everything that is said.

original: snyan par grags pa la 'dod pa skyed pa yin gyi nor la 'dod pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: snyan par grags pa la 'dod pa skyed pa yin gyi nor la 'dod pa can ma yin no //
translated: He desires fame, not wealth.

original: log par lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin /
analyzed: log par lta ba dang ldan pa ma yin /
translated: He does not have wrong views.

original: gtong ba can yin /
analyzed: gtong ba can yin /
translated: He is generous.

original: mthun par byed pa dang ngag snyan par gyur ba yin /
analyzed: mthun par byed pa dang ngag snyan par gyur ba yin /
translated: He is agreeable and speaks pleasantly.

original: bden par smra ba yin /
analyzed: bden par smra ba yin /
translated: He speaks the truth.

original: nor gzhis rnams 'phel ba dang 'grib par glo bur du mi byed pa yin /
analyzed: nor gzhis rnams 'phel ba dang 'grib par glo bur du mi byed pa yin /
translated: He does not suddenly increase or decrease his wealth and property.

original: mi'i khyad par shes pa yin /
analyzed: mi'i khyad par shes pa yin /
translated: He knows the difference between people.

original: dus nges par legs par ston par byed pa po yin /🔽gnyid che ba ma yin /
analyzed: dus nges par legs par ston par byed pa po yin / gnyid che ba ma yin /
translated: He is a teacher who gives good advice at the right time.🔽He is not very sleepy.

original: le lo med pa yin /
analyzed: le lo med pa yin /
translated: He is not lazy.

original: grogs po brtan pa yin /
analyzed: grogs po brtan pa yin /
translated: He is a steadfast friend.

original: mi phan pa rjes su sten par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: mi phan pa rjes su sten par byed pa ma yin /
translated: He does not follow those who are not helpful.

original: khro ba'i shugs dang dga' ba la ya bo sdom par byed pa yin /
analyzed: khro ba'i shugs dang dga' ba la ya bo sdom par byed pa yin /
translated: He controls the force of anger and the force of joy.

original: zas dang sgom la shin tu kun nas chags pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin /
analyzed: zas dang sgom la shin tu kun nas chags pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin /
translated: He is not very attached to food and meditation.

original: legs par bsam par bya ba rnams sems pa'i yin /
analyzed: legs par bsam par bya ba rnams sems pa'i yin /
translated: He thinks about what should be well thought out.

original: don dus ring du bskor bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: don dus ring du bskor bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: He does not turn his back on the meaning for a long time.

original: chos @403a *// la skye rgu rab tu 'god par byed pa yin /
analyzed: chos @403a *// la skye rgu rab tu 'god par byed pa yin /
translated: He establishes beings in the Dharma.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dge ba rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dge ba rnams byed par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: He performs the virtues of the path of the ten virtues.

original: rgyu dang rkyen legs par ston par byed pa yin; lha dag mchod par byed pa yin /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen legs par ston par byed pa yin; lha dag mchod par byed pa yin /
translated: He teaches causes and conditions well. He worships the gods.

original: bu dang bu mo yang dag pas bde bar yongs su skyong bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: bu dang bu mo yang dag pas bde bar yongs su skyong bar byed pa yin /
translated: He is a true son or daughter who cares for his or her family.

original: rtag par yang shes rab goms par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin /
analyzed: rtag par yang shes rab goms par byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin /
translated: He is always in the habit of cultivating wisdom.

original: yul gyis dkri bar 'gyur ba ma yin /
analyzed: yul gyis dkri bar 'gyur ba ma yin /
translated: He is not led astray by objects.

original: rigs pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyi rigs kyis gzhi sbyin par gtong ngo //
analyzed: rigs pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin rnams kyi rigs kyis gzhi sbyin par gtong ngo //
translated: He is generous with the wealth of his family.

original: de lta bu'i chos sum cu rtsa lnga dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rgyal rigs rgyal po spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de des rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos sum cu rtsa lnga dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rgyal rigs rgyal po spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de des rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro //
translated: A kṣatriya king who is anointed on the crown of the head and who possesses these thirty-five qualities is praised.

original: shin tu nor che ba dang rab tu phal che ba'i dkor dang nye bar mkho ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shin tu nor che ba dang rab tu phal che ba'i dkor dang nye bar mkho ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He becomes very wealthy and has abundant wealth and property.

original: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba rnams kyi lha'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba rnams kyi lha'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
translated: When his body breaks up, he goes to the joyous higher realms and becomes the ruler of the gods in the Heaven Free of Strife.

original: legs par byas par gyur pa de'i rgyu las so //
analyzed: legs par byas par gyur pa de'i rgyu las so //
translated: This is due to his good actions.

original: de la gtsang ba'i rang gi skye bo dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rgyal po nyung zad kyi rang bzhin can ma yin par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa ji lta bus skye bo de gtsang ba la sbyor bas gzhan la phan pa rab tu zhugs pa yin zhe na
analyzed: de la gtsang ba'i rang gi skye bo dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rgyal po nyung zad kyi rang bzhin can ma yin par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa ji lta bus skye bo de gtsang ba la sbyor bas gzhan la phan pa rab tu zhugs pa yin zhe na
translated: How is it that the king, who is endowed with a pure retinue, is not of a nature to be few in number, but is engaged in benefiting others by applying himself to purity?

original: / chos lugs rnam par gzhag pa la shin tu bar yang sa mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / chos lugs rnam par gzhag pa la shin tu bar yang sa mtshams srung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He is a protector of the boundaries of the country because he is very skilled in establishing the religious system.

original: dam tshig srung bar 'gyur ba dang tsab hral can du ma gyur pa @403b dang / rjed dpon la phan pa ma yin par btu 'gog par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam tshig srung bar 'gyur ba dang tsab hral can du ma gyur pa @403b dang / rjed dpon la phan pa ma yin par btu 'gog par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He is a protector of the commitments and does not become lax. He is not a hindrance to the welfare of the people.

original: 'dis phan par gyur pa dag la kun tu sbyor bar byed pa dang / rgyal srid kyang chos kyis legs par srung ngo //
analyzed: 'dis phan par gyur pa dag la kun tu sbyor bar byed pa dang / rgyal srid kyang chos kyis legs par srung ngo //
translated: He is one who connects with those who are helpful and he properly protects the kingdom through the Dharma.

original: phan pa dang grogs su 'gyur ba rnams smra bar byed pa dang / dus su nye bar gnas pa dang drang po'i rang bzhin can gzhan la bzhad gang du byed pa ma yin pa dang / zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dbang gis phan pa ma yin pa rnams rje bo la byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: phan pa dang grogs su 'gyur ba rnams smra bar byed pa dang / dus su nye bar gnas pa dang drang po'i rang bzhin can gzhan la bzhad gang du byed pa ma yin pa dang / zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dbang gis phan pa ma yin pa rnams rje bo la byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: He does not cause his master to do what is harmful, even if he is ordered to do so by his master.🔽He is not led by desire or pride.🔽He never fails in his duties at any time.

original: 'dod pa dang nga rgyal dag gis kyang 'khrid par 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang / gnas skabs thams cad du chos rnams la nyams par gyur pa yod pa ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi don kun nas gleng slong bar byed pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang nga rgyal dag gis kyang 'khrid par 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang / gnas skabs thams cad du chos rnams la nyams par gyur pa yod pa ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi don kun nas gleng slong bar byed pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is always concerned with the welfare of his next life.🔽He is afraid of cyclic existence.🔽He does not deny the ripening of karma.

original: 'khor ba la 'jigs par 'gyur pa dang / las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la skur ba mi 'debs pa dang / nyes par spyod pa rnam pa gsum yang yongs su spong bar byed do //
analyzed: 'khor ba la 'jigs par 'gyur pa dang / las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la skur ba mi 'debs pa dang / nyes par spyod pa rnam pa gsum yang yongs su spong bar byed do //
translated: He abandons the three kinds of misdeeds.

original: goms par yang mi byed do //
analyzed: goms par yang mi byed do //
translated: He does not become habituated to them.

original: chad pa la dga' ba ma yin no; ;blo gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang ste /
analyzed: chad pa la dga' ba ma yin no; ;blo gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang ste /
translated: He does not enjoy punishing others. He is not of a different mind.

original: de rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo gzhan dang bdag nyid kyang legs par 'jug par byed de //
analyzed: de rnam pa de lta bu dag gis skye bo gzhan dang bdag nyid kyang legs par 'jug par byed de //
translated: With such qualities, he will engage in good conduct both with others and himself.

original: rgyas par yang byed do //
analyzed: rgyas par yang byed do //
translated: He will also expand his good conduct.

original: 'jig rten gnyis su phan pa byed par gyur ba'i skye bo rnam pa de lta bu de dag gi skye bo dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos rgyal khams kyang skyong bar byed cing rang dang gzhan yang 'dzin par byed pa @404a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten gnyis su phan pa byed par gyur ba'i skye bo rnam pa de lta bu de dag gi skye bo dang ldan pa'i rgyal pos rgyal khams kyang skyong bar byed cing rang dang gzhan yang 'dzin par byed pa @404a *//
translated: The king who possesses such a person who benefits both himself and others will rule the country and will also be able to protect himself and others.

original: rnams ni; lus zhig nas mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnams ni; lus zhig nas mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: When his body disintegrates, he will go to the joyous higher realms and become the ruler of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: yang chos gzhan dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa'i rgyal pos rgyal khams legs par skyong bar byed pa ni /
analyzed: yang chos gzhan dang yang dag par ldan par gyur pa'i rgyal pos rgyal khams legs par skyong bar byed pa ni /
translated: “ ‘Another quality that a king who rules the country well should possess is as follows.

original: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: When his body disintegrates, he will go to the joyous higher realms and become the ruler of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: gang dag zhe na; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang dag zhe na; 'di lta ste /
translated: What are they?

original: nges pa dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu rnams za bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nges pa dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu rnams za bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: They are the consumption of the fruits of certainty.

original: nges pa med pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nges pa med pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “‘The absence of certainty’ means

analyzed: de'i yul lam grong khyer ram grong ngam tshong dus rnams kyang rung ste; dus thams cad dang gnas skabs thams cad du nges par byas pa'i dpya rnams yod par gyur pa las de dag rnams de kho na bzhin du rgyal po 'dis nyams par ma gyur ba'ang dus
translated: that the king does not allow the taxes that are due to him at all times and in all circumstances from the villages, towns, markets, and countries to decline.

original: kyi skyon gyis sam /
analyzed: kyi skyon gyis sam /
translated: If, due to a fault of time,

analyzed: ma nor bar gyur nas rim gyis 'phel bar gyur pa'i rang gi dngos po rnams rigs pa ma yin pas 'phrog par byed na /
translated: he takes possession of those things by illegitimate means,

analyzed: 'jal byed la 'jal bar mi byed pa dang / g-yos bden par 'gyur pa yod dam ci /

analyzed: de ltar rgyal po nges pa'i 'bras bu zad par byed pa yin no //

analyzed: des skye rgu rnams 'tshe bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not harm living beings.

original: yul 'khor yang yongs su srung bar byed do //
analyzed: yul 'khor yang yongs su srung bar byed do //
translated: He also protects his realm.

translated: When his body disintegrates, he goes to the joyous higher realms and becomes the lord of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

analyzed: @404b yang chos gzhan dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rgyal pos yul 'khor yongs su skyong bar byed do //

analyzed: skye rgu kun tu dga' bar yang byed do // gang dag zhe na /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: bzod pa dang ldan par gyur pa'o //

analyzed: grong khyer nyes pa can rnams la'ang gtse ba skyed par yang mi byed do //

analyzed: grogs po'i drung du tshig rtsub mo rnams smra bar yang mi byed do //
translated: He does not speak harsh words even to his friends.

analyzed: khro ba skyes par gyur na'ang bzod pas rab tu zhi bar byed do //
translated: When anger arises, he pacifies it with patience.

analyzed: 'dis snyan pa rjod par byed do //

analyzed: de ltar gnas skabs thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad dang / dus thams cad du snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur te /

analyzed: rang bzhin gyis yin gyi / dgos pa rnams kyi rgyu gang las kyang ni /
translated: It is his nature.

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: He is not motivated by any ulterior purpose.

original: rgyal po de bzod pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag gis lus zhig nas mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po de bzod pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyu de dag dang rkyen de dag gis lus zhig nas mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: For those reasons and conditions, when the king’s body breaks up, he goes to a happy realm and becomes the lord of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar gyur pa 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu'ang phan par 'gyur ba'i phyogs @405a *//
analyzed: rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar gyur pa 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu'ang phan par 'gyur ba'i phyogs @405a *//
translated: “A member of the ruling class who has been consecrated on the crown of the head as a king will be beneficial in this world and the next.

original: 'dzin med par lugs legs par skyong bar byed pa 'di'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dzin med par lugs legs par skyong bar byed pa 'di'ang gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the king of the warrior caste who is consecrated on the crown of the head, who is impartial, and who rules righteously for the benefit of this world and the next?

original: bla na med pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa mtshungs pas rgyal po yul ljongs pa rnams thams cad kyi ma dang pha dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa mtshungs pas rgyal po yul ljongs pa rnams thams cad kyi ma dang pha dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “He is the one who, with an attitude of unsurpassed virtue, is like a father and mother to all the people of the country.

original: gcig tu nor gyi rgyus dang / phan 'dogs pa'i rgyus dang / rang gi skye bo yin pa'i rgyus dang / sngon phan btags pa'i rgyus dang / 'brel par gyur pa'i rgyus dang / skye rgu'i bdag por gyur pa dang dmag gi dpon po yin pa'i rgyus kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig tu nor gyi rgyus dang / phan 'dogs pa'i rgyus dang / rang gi skye bo yin pa'i rgyus dang / sngon phan btags pa'i rgyus dang / 'brel par gyur pa'i rgyus dang / skye rgu'i bdag por gyur pa dang dmag gi dpon po yin pa'i rgyus kyang ma yin te /
translated: He is not motivated by the desire for wealth, by the desire for assistance, by the desire for his own people, by the desire for past favors, by the desire for a connection, or by the desire for his position as lord of the people or as a military leader.

original: gnas skabs thams cad du'ang phyogs 'dzin par mi byed do //
analyzed: gnas skabs thams cad du'ang phyogs 'dzin par mi byed do //
translated: He is impartial in all circumstances.

original: de lugs rnam par gzhag pa byed pa'i dus na grogs po dang grogs po ma yin pa la blo mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lugs rnam par gzhag pa byed pa'i dus na grogs po dang grogs po ma yin pa la blo mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: When he acts in this way, he will be impartial toward friends and foes.

original: de dag rnams byed par gyur pa na rgyal po de'i yul ljongs yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag rnams byed par gyur pa na rgyal po de'i yul ljongs yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When he acts in this way, the king’s country will not decline.

original: snyan grags kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snyan grags kyang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: His fame will not decline.

original: rgyal po med pa'i grong khyer du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po med pa'i grong khyer du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not become a king of a city without a king.

original: gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not be threatened by other armies.

original: rgyal po gzhan kha drag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyal po gzhan kha drag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not be a king who is weak.

original: de dus yun ring du rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dus yun ring du rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be a king for a long time.

original: lus zhig par gyur nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus zhig par gyur nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: And when his body breaks up, he will go to a happy realm and be a lord among the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: gzhan yang rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la gces par 'gyur ba'i chos @405b yod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la gces par 'gyur ba'i chos @405b yod pa ni /
translated: “ ‘There is also another quality that is cherished by the royal class, those who are anointed on the head.

original: 'jig rten gnyis la phan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug par yang byed do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gnyis la phan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug par yang byed do //
translated: It is beneficial for both the world and the transcendence of the world.

original: 'di'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: bla ma mchod par byed pa'o //🔽bla ma zhes bya ba'ang ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bla ma mchod par byed pa'o // bla ma zhes bya ba'ang ji lta ba bzhin du de kho na ston par byed pa'o //
translated: The worship of the guru.🔽The guru is the one who teaches reality just as it is.🔽He is endowed with morality, wisdom, and austerity, and is engaged in the welfare of sentient beings. He is a doer of pure virtue.🔽His physical and verbal actions are peaceful.

original: de'ang tshul khrims dang shes rab dang dka' thub dang ldan zhing sems can rnams la phan pa la legs par zhugs par gyur pa; gcig tu nges par dge bar byed pa po //🔽lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' rab tu zhi ba /

original: dri ma rnams dang bral bar gyur pa de gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa de la rjes su rten par byed do //
analyzed: dri ma rnams dang bral bar gyur pa de gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa de la rjes su rten par byed do //
translated: He is to be attended upon.🔽He is to be followed.🔽He is to be relied upon.🔽He is to be served.

original: de dag gi drung nas ngag 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: de dag gi drung nas ngag 'dzin par byed do //
translated: He is to be attended upon.🔽He is to be followed.🔽He is to be relied upon.🔽He is to be served.🔽He is to be attended upon.

original: de ji ltar spyod par byed pa de ltar de'ang spyod par byed do //
analyzed: de ji ltar spyod par byed pa de ltar de'ang spyod par byed do //
translated: He is to be followed.🔽He is to be relied upon.🔽He is to be served.

original: rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi po nas dbang bskur ba dag de mchod par byed pas 'di la rtag tu phan par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi po nas dbang bskur ba dag de mchod par byed pas 'di la rtag tu phan par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
translated: When a member of the warrior class is consecrated as king, he is worshipped. He will always be happy in this life and, when his body breaks up, he will go to the higher realms and become the lord of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: dge ba'i las de'i rkyen rnams dang / dge ba de dag gi rgyu las so //
analyzed: dge ba'i las de'i rkyen rnams dang / dge ba de dag gi rgyu las so //
translated: The conditions for that virtuous karma and the causes of that virtue are as follows.

original: gzhan yang rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la gces par 'gyur ba'i chos su gyur pa dag gis 'jig rten gnyis su phan par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la gces par 'gyur ba'i chos su gyur pa dag gis 'jig rten gnyis su phan par gyur pa ni /
translated: “Moreover, there are things that are cherished by a member of the warrior class who has been consecrated as king. They are beneficial in both the present life and in the next life.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: What are they?

original: sngar byin nas phyis kyang ster bar gyur pa'o //🔽gang yang phas sam /
analyzed: sngar byin nas phyis kyang ster bar gyur pa'o // gang yang phas sam /
translated: Giving in the past and giving in the present.

original: mes pos sam /
analyzed: mes pos sam /
translated: What was given by one’s father,

original: yang mes pos sam /
analyzed: yang mes pos sam /
translated: grandfather,🔽great-grandfather,🔽or others,

original: @406a *// gzhan gyis sam /🔽de dag dang de las gzhan pa rnams kyis kyang rung ste /
analyzed: @406a *// gzhan gyis sam /🔽de dag dang de las gzhan pa rnams kyis kyang rung ste /
translated: or what is given by oneself,

original: rtag tu gang phyin par gyur pa las gzhi'am dbyig la sogs pa rnams 'dren ma dang rnyog ma can du gyur pa'i sems ma yin pas dang / phan pa dang mchog tu dad pas de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed cing de dag nyid la dga' ba dang /
analyzed: rtag tu gang phyin par gyur pa las gzhi'am dbyig la sogs pa rnams 'dren ma dang rnyog ma can du gyur pa'i sems ma yin pas dang / phan pa dang mchog tu dad pas de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed cing de dag nyid la dga' ba dang /
translated: He is not a person whose mind is mixed up or confused about the ground, gold, and so on, that he has always given away. He is pleased with those who are helpful and supremely faithful, and he rejoices in them.

original: slar nyid yang sbyin pa bsngags par byed do //
analyzed: slar nyid yang sbyin pa bsngags par byed do //
translated: He praises giving again and again.

original: gzhan yang sbyin pa rjes su gtong ba la rab tu 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyin pa rjes su gtong ba la rab tu 'jug par byed do //
translated: He engages in giving generously.

original: de nyid kyang de bzhin du rab tu gnas pa dang rab tu 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa'i rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di'i lus zhig nas las de dag rnams kyi rgyu dang / rkyen de dag gis kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyang de bzhin du rab tu gnas pa dang rab tu 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa'i rgyal rigs rgyal por spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di'i lus zhig nas las de dag rnams kyi rgyu dang / rkyen de dag gis kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba'i mnga' bdag tu skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the king, the head anointed, who is established in this way and who engages in this way, dies, then by the power of those causes and conditions, he is reborn as the lord of the gods in the celestial realm of the Yāma gods.

original: chos gzhan yang rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i 'jig rten gnyis su don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba 'di yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: chos gzhan yang rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i 'jig rten gnyis su don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba 'di yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is the other quality that leads to the king’s happiness in both this world and the next?🔽

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “What is the other quality that is beneficial and conducive to happiness in both this world and the next?🔽It is generosity.

original: sbyin pa'o // sbyin pa zhes bya ba'ang gnas skabs thams cad dang / thams cad nyid la dang / rnam pa thams cad du dang / dus thams cad du dang / blo gros thams cad la'ang phan bar 'gyur ba dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'o // sbyin pa zhes bya ba'ang gnas skabs thams cad dang / thams cad nyid la dang / rnam pa thams cad du dang / dus thams cad du dang / blo gros thams cad la'ang phan bar 'gyur ba dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Generosity is beneficial and conducive to happiness in all circumstances, in every way, at all times, and for all people.

original: thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad du'ang dmyal ba dang / yi dvags @406b dang / dud 'gror skyes pa rnams la'ang bkres pa rnam par 'joms pa dang / skom pa rnam par 'joms par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad du'ang dmyal ba dang / yi dvags @406b dang / dud 'gror skyes pa rnams la'ang bkres pa rnam par 'joms pa dang / skom pa rnam par 'joms par byed pa yin na /
translated: It destroys hunger and thirst for all beings, even those born in the hells, as hungry ghosts, or as animals.

original: lha dang mi rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba la lta smos kyang ci dgos /
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba la lta smos kyang ci dgos /
translated: What need is there to mention its benefits for gods and humans?

original: gtong pa can gyi rgyal po ni /
analyzed: gtong pa can gyi rgyal po ni /
translated: A king who is generous

original: mthong ba'i tshe'i 'bras bu dang yang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba'i tshe'i 'bras bu dang yang ldan pa yin no //
translated: will enjoy the fruits of his generosity even after he dies.

original: gang dag zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: grags pas rjes su dga' bar gyur nas grong khyer dang yul ljongs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / de dag rnams kyis yongs su spong bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grags pas rjes su dga' bar gyur nas grong khyer dang yul ljongs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / de dag rnams kyis yongs su spong bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One becomes happy and prosperous in one’s village and country. One is not abandoned by one’s friends.

original: des yul ljongs gzhan gyi mchod pa'ang bla na med pa 'thob bo //🔽de nyid mngon par kun tu mthong nas kyang phas kyi dpung rnams kyis kyang zil gyis mi non no //
analyzed: des yul ljongs gzhan gyi mchod pa'ang bla na med pa 'thob bo // de nyid mngon par kun tu mthong nas kyang phas kyi dpung rnams kyis kyang zil gyis mi non no //
translated: One obtains the worship of other countries.🔽One is not overcome by the armies of enemies.

original: 'di la dgra rnams kyis bar du gcod pa phra mo tsam yang bya bar glags mi thod do //
analyzed: 'di la dgra rnams kyis bar du gcod pa phra mo tsam yang bya bar glags mi thod do //
translated: One is not harmed by one’s enemies.

original: de yul dang grong khyer gyi mchog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: de yul dang grong khyer gyi mchog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: One becomes prosperous in one’s village and country.

original: goms par ma gyur pa rnams la'ang ma thong ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: goms par ma gyur pa rnams la'ang ma thong ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: This is the result of the gift of Dharma, even when it is not practiced, much more so when it is practiced.

original: gang yang zhing dang / dngos po dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas sbyin pa byin par gyur pa rnams la lta ci smos /
analyzed: gang yang zhing dang / dngos po dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas sbyin pa byin par gyur pa rnams la lta ci smos /
translated: What need is there to mention one who gives the gift of Dharma with a perfect field, a perfect object, and a perfect attitude?

original: des ni / gcig tu dga' bar gyur pa dang / gcig tu ngan song gi sgo rnam par sdom pa dang / gcig tu rnam par smin pa bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni / gcig tu dga' bar gyur pa dang / gcig tu ngan song gi sgo rnam par sdom pa dang / gcig tu rnam par smin pa bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one-pointed joy, one-pointed closure of the doors to the lower realms, and one-pointed happiness in terms of karmic ripening.

original: de la sbyin pa sbyin par bya ba rnams ni /🔽rnam pa du ma yod do //
analyzed: de la sbyin pa sbyin par bya ba rnams ni / rnam pa du ma yod do //
translated: There are many types of generosity.

original: rnam pa du ma de'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa du ma de'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What are these many types?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs @407a *//
analyzed: 'di lta ste / zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / mi 'jigs @407a *//
translated: They are

original: pa'i sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: pa'i sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'o //
translated: the generosity of material things, the generosity of fearlessness, and the generosity of the Dharma.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyin pa rnams gang gi tshe rgyal po des dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la gtong bar byed pa de'ang lus zhig nas mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi bdag por las de'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis 'gyur
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyin pa rnams gang gi tshe rgyal po des dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la gtong bar byed pa de'ang lus zhig nas mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi bdag por las de'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis 'gyur
translated: When the king gives these types of generosity to ascetics and brahmins, then, when his body disintegrates, he will go to the joyous higher realms and become the lord of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife due to the causes and conditions of that action.

original: ro // gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la gces par 'gyur ba'i chos 'jig rten gnyis la phan par byed pa yod do //
analyzed: ro // gzhan yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la gces par 'gyur ba'i chos 'jig rten gnyis la phan par byed pa yod do //
translated: Moreover, there is a Dharma that is cherished by a king, a kṣatriya anointed on the crown of his head, which benefits the two worlds.

original: 'di'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: chos byed pa ma yin pa rnams mi 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: chos byed pa ma yin pa rnams mi 'dzin pa'o //
translated: It is not supporting those who do not practice the Dharma.

original: rgyal po rgyal rigs rnams kyang gang gi phyir chos dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyal po rgyal rigs rnams kyang gang gi phyir chos dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Because of that, kings and kṣatriyas are righteous and follow the Dharma.

original: chos byed pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams nges par 'gegs par mi byed pa dang / 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos byed pa ma yin pa rnams kyi mgrin pa mi gtsang bar byed pa po log par lta bas ri dvags kyi 'khor ba 'grol bar byed pa /
analyzed: chos byed pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams nges par 'gegs par mi byed pa dang / 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos byed pa ma yin pa rnams kyi mgrin pa mi gtsang bar byed pa po log par lta bas ri dvags kyi 'khor ba 'grol bar byed pa /
translated: They do not obstruct those who do not practice the Dharma, they do not support them, and they do not make the necks of those who do not practice the Dharma unclean. They liberate the deer of wrong views.

original: mchod sbyin dang phyugs gsod par byed pa /
analyzed: mchod sbyin dang phyugs gsod par byed pa /
translated: They perform sacrifices and kill cattle.

original: skyes bu tha chad du gyur pa /
analyzed: skyes bu tha chad du gyur pa /
translated: They become inferior people.

original: skyes bu phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa /
analyzed: skyes bu phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa /
translated: They hold wrong views.

original: pha ma la gus pa med pa dang rnam ba de lta bur gyur pa rnams yul du 'dzin par mi byed do //
analyzed: pha ma la gus pa med pa dang rnam ba de lta bur gyur pa rnams yul du 'dzin par mi byed do //
translated: They do not respect their parents and are of such a kind.

original: de dang bsten 'grogs byas par gyur pa'i skyon gyis skyes bu gzhan dag dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang rab tu chud gzon par byed do //
analyzed: de dang bsten 'grogs byas par gyur pa'i skyon gyis skyes bu gzhan dag dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang rab tu chud gzon par byed do //
translated: Other people who have a virtuous mind are also ruined by the fault of associating with them.

original: de dag rnams la bsten @407b ba'i skyon gyis de dag chud gzan pas 'di'i mnga' byed pa rnams yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag rnams la bsten @407b ba'i skyon gyis de dag chud gzan pas 'di'i mnga' byed pa rnams yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of the fault of associating with them, they are ruined. Therefore, their rulers decline.

original: dus ma yin par char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus ma yin par char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: Untimely rains fall.

original: dus ma yin par lhas shin tu tsha bar byed do //
analyzed: dus ma yin par lhas shin tu tsha bar byed do //
translated: Untimely, the gods make it very hot.

original: dus ma yin par lo tog rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dus ma yin par lo tog rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Untimely, they bring the harvest to completion.

original: yul ljongs brlag par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul ljongs brlag par yang 'gyur te /
translated: The country is destroyed.

original: sdig pa byed pa po de rnams kyi nyes dmigs chen pos so //
analyzed: sdig pa byed pa po de rnams kyi nyes dmigs chen pos so //
translated: Because of the great danger of those who do evil.

original: rgyu des na chos byed pa rnams 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu des na chos byed pa rnams 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: For that reason, those who practice the Dharma are supported.

original: skyes bu chos byed pa kun tu bzung bas kyang lhas dus su char 'bebs so //
analyzed: skyes bu chos byed pa kun tu bzung bas kyang lhas dus su char 'bebs so //
translated: Because all people who practice the Dharma are supported, the gods rain down at the right time.

original: dus su rlung rgyu'o //
analyzed: dus su rlung rgyu'o //
translated: The wind blows at the right time.

original: dus su lo tog rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dus su lo tog rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The crops ripen at the right time.

original: yul ljongs brlag par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul ljongs brlag par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The country is not destroyed.

original: 'jigs pa dang / mya ngan dang / yang ba dang / skye rgu rnams bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang / mya ngan dang / yang ba dang / skye rgu rnams bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Fear, sorrow, and anxiety leave the people.

original: skyes bu chos de dag mnga' byed par gyur pas 'du byed rnams thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par chad par byed do //
analyzed: skyes bu chos de dag mnga' byed par gyur pas 'du byed rnams thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par chad par byed do //
translated: The king who possesses these qualities severs the suffering of all beings.

original: skyes bu chos byed legs par 'dzin cing sten par byed pa 'di'i snying po'i mchog ni /
analyzed: skyes bu chos byed legs par 'dzin cing sten par byed pa 'di'i snying po'i mchog ni /
translated: The best essence of a person who practices the Dharma is

original: tshangs par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa'o //
translated: pure conduct.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: skyes bu chos byed rnams sten pa'am legs par 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu chos byed rnams sten pa'am legs par 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: Practicing the Dharma is the best essence of a person.

original: de'i phyir na blo dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyal rigs rgyal po spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas skyes bu chos byed pa la kun tu bsten par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na blo dang ldan par gyur pa'i rgyal rigs rgyal po spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas skyes bu chos byed pa la kun tu bsten par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the intelligent king, the lord of men, should rely on people who practice the Dharma.

original: de las kyang 'jig rten gnyis su phan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang 'jig rten gnyis su phan par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, he will benefit both this world and the next.

original: lus zhig par gyur nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi @408a *//
analyzed: lus zhig par gyur nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi @408a *//
translated: When their bodies disintegrate, they go to the joyous higher realms and are born among the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.🔽

original: mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
translated: When their bodies disintegrate, they will go to the joyous higher realms and become the ruler of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: las de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis so //
analyzed: las de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis so //
translated: This is due to the causes and conditions of such actions.

original: gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po dang sten par mi 'gyur ba la sdig pa'i grogs po'ang rnam pa brgyad spang bar bya ste /
analyzed: gang gis sdig pa'i grogs po dang sten par mi 'gyur ba la sdig pa'i grogs po'ang rnam pa brgyad spang bar bya ste /
translated: “ ‘One should avoid the eight types of unwholesome companions.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: What are these eight?

original: med par smra bar gyur pa gang gis sbyin sreg med do //
analyzed: med par smra bar gyur pa gang gis sbyin sreg med do //
translated: The first type of unwholesome companion is someone who denies the existence of fire offerings,

original: sbyin pa med do //
analyzed: sbyin pa med do //
translated: generosity,🔽this world,

original: 'jig rten 'di med do //🔽pha rol med do //🔽zhes zer ba 'di ni /🔽sdig pa'i grogs po gcig yin no //🔽sdig pa'i grogs po gnyis pa yod de //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di med do // pha rol med do // zhes zer ba 'di ni / sdig pa'i grogs po gcig yin no // sdig pa'i grogs po gnyis pa yod de //
translated: and the next world.

original: 'di ltar bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa yod pa ni /🔽ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa yod pa ni / ma yin no //
translated: The second type of unwholesome companion is someone who says, “There is no such thing as a path that should not be traversed.

original: tshangs par spyod pa med do //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa med do //
translated: There is no such thing as pure conduct.

original: nam zla dang dus kyis bud med dag la thams cad kyis bgrod par bya ba'o //
analyzed: nam zla dang dus kyis bud med dag la thams cad kyis bgrod par bya ba'o //
translated: Women can be approached by everyone, according to the season and the time.

original: skyes bu gsum pa sdig pa'i grogs por gyur pa ni /
analyzed: skyes bu gsum pa sdig pa'i grogs por gyur pa ni /
translated: The third type of unwholesome companion is someone who says, “There is no such thing as a virtuous or unvirtuous action.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: ji ltar gang dag sems can rnams la byin pa dang mer bcug pa de dag rnams kyi bcug par gyur ba ni /
analyzed: ji ltar gang dag sems can rnams la byin pa dang mer bcug pa de dag rnams kyi bcug par gyur ba ni /
translated: Those who give to sentient beings and then burn it

original: ma bcug pa yin no //
analyzed: ma bcug pa yin no //
translated: are not giving.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po bzhi pa ni /
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po bzhi pa ni /
translated: The fourth type of bad friend is

original: 'di na ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar de srid cig kho nar skyes bu dag 'gyur gyi de shi bar gyur na /
analyzed: 'di na ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar de srid cig kho nar skyes bu dag 'gyur gyi de shi bar gyur na /
translated: one who says, “People live for just a short time, as long as they are born.

original: de'i phyir de'i legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang ji ltar sprin dang khug rna rnams rnam par rnams nas slar yang mi 'jug pa de bzhin du lus can de dag rnams kyi bsod nams dang / sdig pa'ang yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa de dag rnams thams cad kyang ji ltar sprin dang khug rna rnams rnam par rnams nas slar yang mi 'jug pa de bzhin du lus can de dag rnams kyi bsod nams dang / sdig pa'ang yin no //
translated: When they die, all their good and bad actions are like clouds and fog that disappear and do not return. The same is true of the merit and sin of embodied beings.”

original: sdig pa'i grogs po lnga bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po lnga bar gyur pa ni /
translated: The fifth type of bad friend is

original: pha @408b dang ma'i rtsa nas 'byed par byed do //
analyzed: pha @408b dang ma'i rtsa nas 'byed par byed do //
translated: one who causes division between parents and children.

original: gus pa dang rnam par 'bral bar byed do //
analyzed: gus pa dang rnam par 'bral bar byed do //
translated: He causes them to lose respect for each other.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po drug pa yod do //
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po drug pa yod do //
translated: The sixth type of bad friend is

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: one who says,🔽“There is no good or bad action, no ripening of good or bad actions, no karmic result of good or bad actions.

original: srog gcod pa bya bar byas te rgan po dang / long ba dang / mgon med pa dang / bkren pa rnams so //
analyzed: srog gcod pa bya bar byas te rgan po dang / long ba dang / mgon med pa dang / bkren pa rnams so //
translated: They kill the old, the blind, the helpless, and the poor.

original: de dag kyang shi nas 'jig rten gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang shi nas 'jig rten gzhan du bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When they die, they will be happy in the next world.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po bdun pa ni /
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po bdun pa ni /
translated: “ ‘The seventh bad friend is

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: those who say, “All of this is created by the gods.

original: gang dag rlung gis sam; de'i tshe mes bsreg pa dang / rlung za ba dang / gdung ba lngas dus byed pa ni /
analyzed: gang dag rlung gis sam; de'i tshe mes bsreg pa dang / rlung za ba dang / gdung ba lngas dus byed pa ni /
translated: When they are burned by the wind, by fire, or by the five torments,

original: de dag gi 'jig rten zad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag gi 'jig rten zad par 'gyur te /
translated: their world will be destroyed.

original: gzhan dag tu brje bar 'gyur bas so //
analyzed: gzhan dag tu brje bar 'gyur bas so //
translated: They will be reborn in another world.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po brgyad pa ni /🔽'di dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po brgyad pa ni / 'di dag thams cad ni /
translated: “ ‘The eighth bad friend is

original: lhas byas kyi /🔽las dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: lhas byas kyi / las dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni /
translated: those who say, “All of this is created by the gods.

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: It is not the characteristics of karma and its effects.

original: sdig pa'i grogs po brgyad po de dag rnams legs par yongs su spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: sdig pa'i grogs po brgyad po de dag rnams legs par yongs su spang bar bya'o //
translated: “ ‘One should completely abandon those eight bad friends.

original: kun spang bar bya'o //🔽yul du 'jog par mi byed do //
analyzed: kun spang bar bya'o // yul du 'jog par mi byed do //
translated: One should completely give them up.🔽One should not keep them in one’s country.

original: phrad par yang mi byed do //
analyzed: phrad par yang mi byed do //
translated: One should not associate with them.

original: gang dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag par ji lta bar brjod pa de dag rjes su 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: gang dag gis rgyu dang 'bras bu yang dag par ji lta bar brjod pa de dag rjes su 'dzin par byed do //
translated: They are the ones who uphold the correct understanding of cause and effect.

original: de dag rnams kyi drung nas dam pa'i chos rjes su 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi drung nas dam pa'i chos rjes su 'dzin par byed do //
translated: From them, the sacred Dharma is upheld.

original: 'jig rten gnyis la phan pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyal po 'di ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten gnyis la phan pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i rgyal po 'di ni /
translated: This king, who is engaged in benefiting the two worlds,

original: lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: will, after the disintegration of his body, go to the higher realms and become the lord of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: gzhan yang rgyal pos chos rab tu gzhol bar bya ba 'di'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyal pos chos rab tu gzhol bar bya ba 'di'ang gang zhe na /
translated: “ ‘What, moreover, is the king’s pursuit of the Dharma?

original: 'di lta ste /🔽bud med kyi dbang @409a *//
analyzed: 'di lta ste / bud med kyi dbang @409a *//
translated: It is as follows:

original: du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: not being under the power of women.

original: skyes bu tha mal ba rnams bud med kyi dbang du 'gro ba thams cad la'ang 'jig rten pa rnams thams cad kyis gshe bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes bu tha mal ba rnams bud med kyi dbang du 'gro ba thams cad la'ang 'jig rten pa rnams thams cad kyis gshe bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All ordinary people who are under the power of women are despised by everyone in the world.

original: ci yang mchog tu rgya che ba'i rigs rgyud du legs par skyes pa'i rgyal po lta ci smos /
analyzed: ci yang mchog tu rgya che ba'i rigs rgyud du legs par skyes pa'i rgyal po lta ci smos /
translated: What need is there to mention a king who has been born into a family that is most exalted?

original: bud med thams cad ni /
analyzed: bud med thams cad ni /
translated: All women

original: rnam par 'byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin no //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin no //
translated: He is of a discriminating nature.

original: des yul 'khor dang / yul ljongs rgya chen po rnams thams cad las rgyal po rnam par 'byed par byed do //
analyzed: des yul 'khor dang / yul ljongs rgya chen po rnams thams cad las rgyal po rnam par 'byed par byed do //
translated: He discriminates between the king and the entire realm and country.

original: 'dod pas zil gyis mnan par gyur pas lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams sun 'don par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod pas zil gyis mnan par gyur pas lhan cig tu 'grogs pa rnams sun 'don par 'gyur ro //
translated: He is contemptuous of his companions because he is overcome by desire.

original: nor gyi chos kyi rjes su 'jug par byed la sbyin pa 'gog par byed do //
analyzed: nor gyi chos kyi rjes su 'jug par byed la sbyin pa 'gog par byed do //
translated: He follows the dharma of wealth and stops giving.

original: 'dod pas zil gyis mnan par gyur pa gang gi phyir le lo can rnams thams cad kyang bud med 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: 'dod pas zil gyis mnan par gyur pa gang gi phyir le lo can rnams thams cad kyang bud med 'dzin par byed do //
translated: Because he is overcome by desire, he is lazy and holds on to women.

original: 'dod chags kyi bsam pas glor kun nas bskor bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi bsam pas glor kun nas bskor bar byed do //
translated: He is surrounded by thoughts of passion.

original: skyes bu rang gi don rnams las yongs su nyams par byed do //
analyzed: skyes bu rang gi don rnams las yongs su nyams par byed do //
translated: He is a man who has fallen from his own goals.

original: skyes pa chos kyi bsam pa yang dag par byung ba'ang bud med thams cad kyis rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang / phra ma'i bsam pa dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog gi skye gnas can de dag rnams kyis skye ba rnams rang bzhin mtshungs par byed do //
analyzed: skyes pa chos kyi bsam pa yang dag par byung ba'ang bud med thams cad kyis rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang / phra ma'i bsam pa dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog gi skye gnas can de dag rnams kyis skye ba rnams rang bzhin mtshungs par byed do //
translated: “ ‘Women will also destroy the pure thoughts of men who are devoted to the Dharma. They will make the birthplace of slander, pride, and jealousy equal to their own nature.

original: bud med kyis 'tsho bar gyur pa de dag ni /
analyzed: bud med kyis 'tsho bar gyur pa de dag ni /
translated: “ ‘Women are the livelihood of others.

original: sbrul nag po @409b mthong ba'i dug can de dag gis yongs su nyams par byed do //
analyzed: sbrul nag po @409b mthong ba'i dug can de dag gis yongs su nyams par byed do //
translated: They are like black snakes, poisonous to behold.

original: de'i phyir bud med kyis 'tsho bar gyur pa'i rgyal po zhe ldog go /
analyzed: de'i phyir bud med kyis 'tsho bar gyur pa'i rgyal po zhe ldog go /
translated: Therefore, a king who lives by women will be despised.

original: de dag gi gzhi'ang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de dag gi gzhi'ang 'di lta ste /
translated: The basis for that is as follows:🔽Women are called the basis.

original: bud med ces bya ba'o; ;gzhi des 'tsho bar gyur pas de ches btsog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bud med ces bya ba'o; ;gzhi des 'tsho bar gyur pas de ches btsog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because they live on that basis, they are very dirty.

original: kun gyi lam du gyur pa chos kyi dus las lhung nas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun gyi lam du gyur pa chos kyi dus las lhung nas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: They fall from the path of all and from the time of the Dharma, and they degenerate.

original: skyes bu bud med la gtsor byed pa rnams ni /
analyzed: skyes bu bud med la gtsor byed pa rnams ni /
translated: “ ‘Men who are devoted to women

original: sdug bsngal dang lang tsho dag kyang kun tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang lang tsho dag kyang kun tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will also be subject to suffering and old age.

original: 'dod chags la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i skyon gyis rtag tu'ang thams cad kyis de yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags la mchog tu 'dzin pa'i skyon gyis rtag tu'ang thams cad kyis de yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of the fault of being obsessed with desire, they will always be abandoned by everyone.

original: de'ang bud med de nyid rang gis slu bar byed do //
analyzed: de'ang bud med de nyid rang gis slu bar byed do //
translated: And they will be deceived by those very women.

original: dkrig ma 'di dag rnams thams cad ni /
analyzed: dkrig ma 'di dag rnams thams cad ni /
translated: All these women

original: rang bzhin kho nas 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin kho nas 'di lta ste /
translated: are by nature

original: gsar pa la zhon par byed pa dang / byas pa chud gzon pa dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur na yongs su spong ba la mkhas pa dang / 'dod pa dang phrag dog phal che bar gnas pas kyang de dag rnams ni /
analyzed: gsar pa la zhon par byed pa dang / byas pa chud gzon pa dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur na yongs su spong ba la mkhas pa dang / 'dod pa dang phrag dog phal che bar gnas pas kyang de dag rnams ni /
translated: addicted to novelty, wasteful, skilled at abandoning those who suffer, greedy, and jealous.

original: skyes pa la ngal sos par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: skyes pa la ngal sos par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: They never give men a rest.

original: gang yang bud med kyi dbang gis 'gro bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: gang yang bud med kyi dbang gis 'gro bar gyur pa ni /
translated: Those who go along with women

original: grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / tshong 'dus rnams thams cad du'ang 'di la skye bo dag gis shin tu bar yang gshe bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / tshong 'dus rnams thams cad du'ang 'di la skye bo dag gis shin tu bar yang gshe bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In all the cities, towns, villages, and markets, people will despise him.

original: khyad par du'ang rgyal po la'o //
analyzed: khyad par du'ang rgyal po la'o //
translated: In particular, the king will despise him.

original: de'i phyir bud med bsgrub par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir bud med bsgrub par mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not pursue women.

original: bud med kyis 'jigs shing skyon du lta @410a *//
analyzed: bud med kyis 'jigs shing skyon du lta @410a *//
translated: Fearing women and seeing them as a fault,

original: ba de ni; lus zhig nas mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba de ni; lus zhig nas mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: after the collapse of the body, he will go to the joyous higher realms and become the lord of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: yang chos gzhan rgyal pos mi bya'o //
analyzed: yang chos gzhan rgyal pos mi bya'o //
translated: “ ‘There is another quality that a king should not pursue.

original: 'di'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is this:

original: thams cad kyi tshig la dad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshig la dad par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not believe the words of everyone.

original: gson pa'i 'jig rten pa 'di dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: gson pa'i 'jig rten pa 'di dag thams cad ni /
translated: All the people in the world of the living

original: rgyud tha dad par gnas pa phal cher yang phan tshun du sems kun nas tha dad pa dang / rang bzhin rnam par tha dad pa dang // dgos pa rnams rnam par tha dad pa dang / rgyu rnam par tha dad pa dang / rang bzhin gyi gshis kyis dri ma'i dngos po rnams rnam par tha dad pa /
analyzed: rgyud tha dad par gnas pa phal cher yang phan tshun du sems kun nas tha dad pa dang / rang bzhin rnam par tha dad pa dang // dgos pa rnams rnam par tha dad pa dang / rgyu rnam par tha dad pa dang / rang bzhin gyi gshis kyis dri ma'i dngos po rnams rnam par tha dad pa /
translated: Even those who live in different bodies are mostly mutually different in mind, different in nature, different in purpose, different in cause, and different in the nature of their faults.🔽They are always fighting, quarreling, and disagreeing. They have different minds, different companions, different natures, and different ways of criticizing each other.

original: rtag tu 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rgyu mthun pa'i sems tha dad pa dang / sten grogs rnam par tha dad pa dang / rang bzhin rnam par tha dad pa dang / yul ljongs la skyon byed pa rnam par tha dad pa rkyen dang bcas pa'i sems yang mor gyur pas kyang phun tshun du rgyab kyi sha za bar byed do //
analyzed: rtag tu 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rgyu mthun pa'i sems tha dad pa dang / sten grogs rnam par tha dad pa dang / rang bzhin rnam par tha dad pa dang / yul ljongs la skyon byed pa rnam par tha dad pa rkyen dang bcas pa'i sems yang mor gyur pas kyang phun tshun du rgyab kyi sha za bar byed do //
translated: They are fickle-minded and eat each other’s flesh.

original: phan tshun mngon sum du thal 'og tu 'jug go /
analyzed: phan tshun mngon sum du thal 'og tu 'jug go /
translated: They are mutually hostile and treacherous.

original: de dag rnams thams cad kyi tshig la rgyal pos tha dad par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de dag rnams thams cad kyi tshig la rgyal pos tha dad par mi bya ste /
translated: The king should not take sides with any of them.

translated: For a long time, he will have faultless and unassailable wealth, free from fear and sorrow. When his body breaks up, after death, he will go to a good realm of existence, to the gods’ happy place of Yāma.

analyzed: bdag tu 'gyur te /

original: 'di'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'ang gang zhe na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: snyan pa'i tshig de bya'o //

analyzed: rang bzhin gyis kyang dga' bar 'gyur ba la /

original: ma yin te /

analyzed: bden pa'i dge ba des kun nas gsal bar byas pa'i rigs can rnams la ni /

analyzed: grong chung ba dag gis mchog tu'ang mchod par byed do //

analyzed: ma mthong ba dag tu'ang lha dag gis snyan grags rab tu sgrog par byed do //

analyzed: 'di'i yid la bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs @415b par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: mthu stobs che ba dang tshe ring ba kun tu 'phel bar byed pa'i las rnams kyang 'gegs byed do //

analyzed: skye bo rnams thams cad kyis kyang chos lugs rnam par bzhag pa la gcig tu tshad mar byed do //

analyzed: rnam par ma bcos pa'i skyes bu rnams kyis kyang nor chen po'i sbas dang sbas pa'ang rgyal po la ston par byed do //

analyzed: bden par smra ba zhes zer nas thams cad las mig g-yo ba bzhin du'o //

analyzed: thams cad las kyang g-yo ba med par 'gyur ro // grogs pos 'khrid par mi byed do //

original: grogs po ma yin pas 'khrid par mi byed do //
analyzed: grogs po ma yin pas 'khrid par mi byed do //

original: rnam par g-yo bar mi byed do //
analyzed: rnam par g-yo bar mi byed do //

translated: He is like one whose throat is parched with thirst, who finds a drink that satisfies his mind with its delicious flavor, and who, delighted, drinks it again and again.

translated: He is not led away by the fickle whims of anger and desire.

translated: He never transgresses the boundary of truth, the essence of the highest sages, which is beneficial in both worlds.

analyzed: chu @416a *// med par yang bden pa'i rang bzhin gyis mchog tu gtsang ba'i bden pa'i 'jug ngogs su 'khru ba rnams ni /
translated: Even without water, those who are purified by the supreme purity of truth, which is the nature of truth, enter the ford of truth.

original: mchog tu gtsang bar 'gyur ro; ;gos med par gyur kyang mchog tu dkar ba ma btags pa bden pa'i gos mchog tu rgya che ba skad cig ma yin par rtag tu legs par gyon par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchog tu gtsang bar 'gyur ro; ;gos med par gyur kyang mchog tu dkar ba ma btags pa bden pa'i gos mchog tu rgya che ba skad cig ma yin par rtag tu legs par gyon par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if he is naked, he is well-clothed in the supreme, vast, and momentary robe of the truth of pure morality.🔽Even if he is without ornament, he is well-adorned with the ornament of the Dharma.🔽Even if he is without fame, his fame spreads in all directions through the fragrance of his morality.

original: dri med par gyur na'ang 'di'i snyan pa'i tshul khrims kyi dris phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su rab tu 'gro'o //
analyzed: dri med par gyur na'ang 'di'i snyan pa'i tshul khrims kyi dris phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su rab tu 'gro'o //
translated: Even if he is without wealth, he is rich with the wealth of the noble ones.

original: 'di ma mthong bar gyur pa'i skye bo thams cad kyang grogs po nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ma mthong bar gyur pa'i skye bo thams cad kyang grogs po nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if he is without retinue, he is accompanied by the noble assembly.

original: mthong ba rnams ni /
analyzed: mthong ba rnams ni /
translated: Even if he is without sight, he sees the noble truths.

original: dang por yin no //
analyzed: dang por yin no //
translated: Even if he is without hearing, he hears the noble Dharma.🔽Even if he is without hands, he takes hold of generosity and morality.

original: ri rab lhun po'i rtse mo'ang 'dis nges par rgal nas 'gro bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ri rab lhun po'i rtse mo'ang 'dis nges par rgal nas 'gro bar 'gyur te /
translated: Even if he is without feet, he goes to the presence of the noble ones.🔽Even if he is without a head, he is endowed with the head of wisdom.🔽Even if he is without a heart, he is endowed with the heart of compassion.🔽Even if he is without a back, he bears the burden of the Dharma.🔽Even if he is without a belly, he is filled with the Dharma.🔽Even if he is without arms and legs, he is endowed with the limbs of enlightenment.🔽Even if he is without a tongue, he has the eloquence of teaching the Dharma.🔽Even if he is without a body, he is endowed with the body of the Dharma.🔽Even if he is without a mind, he is endowed with the wisdom of omniscience.

original: ji ltar 'od zer mchog gis brtol zhing phug par 'gyur ba bzhin du rab tu 'phro bar 'gyur ro //🔽rgan po rnams kyis pha bzhin du mchod par byed de /
analyzed: ji ltar 'od zer mchog gis brtol zhing phug par 'gyur ba bzhin du rab tu 'phro bar 'gyur ro //🔽rgan po rnams kyis pha bzhin du mchod par byed de /
translated: Even if he is without a name, he is known as the one who has attained the highest enlightenment.

original: bden pas rgan par gyur pa zhes byas so; ;tshe ring bar gyur pa 'phen par byed pa'i las rnams kyang 'phen par byed do //
analyzed: bden pas rgan par gyur pa zhes byas so; ;tshe ring bar gyur pa 'phen par byed pa'i las rnams kyang 'phen par byed do //
translated: He is called the elder because of the truth, and he also propels the karma that propels a long life.

original: ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi las 'phen par byed na 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag la lta smos kyang mi dgos //
analyzed: ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi las 'phen par byed na 'thab bral gyi mnga' bdag la lta smos kyang mi dgos //
translated: If he propels the karma of the wisdom of unsurpassed perfect buddhahood, what need is there to mention the lord of the gods of the Heaven Free from Strife?

original: bden par smra ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de lus zhig par @416b gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu mtho ris bde 'gro 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden par smra ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de lus zhig par @416b gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu mtho ris bde 'gro 'thab bral ba rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The kṣatriya who is anointed on the crown of the head and who possesses truthful speech will, when his body disintegrates and he dies, go to the joyful higher realms and become the lord of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: yang chos gzhan dang ldan pa rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang chos gzhan dang ldan pa rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: “ ‘There is another quality that causes a kṣatriya who is anointed on the crown of his head to become the lord of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: gang dag ce na /
analyzed: gang dag ce na /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: ma brtags par byed pa ni /

translated: “ ‘The king who acts after careful consideration, and who increases or decreases the wealth of his subjects,

analyzed: rgyal po de'ang blo brtan par 'gyur ba dang 'gyur ba med pa'i blo dang blo gcig tu nges pa dang bde ba ster bar byed pas lus zhig nas mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu rgyu 'di dang rkyen 'dis 'gyur
translated: “ ‘When the king’s body disintegrates, he will go to the joyous higher realms and become the ruler of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife. This is the cause and condition for that.

analyzed: ro // chos gzhan yang gang lan gcig dang lan gcig ma yin par rnam pa du mar rgyal pos rab tu brtson pa shes par bya zhing bya bar yang bya'o //

original: khro ba sdom par byed pa des ni /
analyzed: khro ba sdom par byed pa des ni /

analyzed: gzhan yang chos gnyis shin tu'ang dgag par bya'o //

analyzed: gnyis po gang dag zhe na / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: rgyal po shin tu'ang zas dang skom rnams la sred pa'i rang bzhin can du mi bya'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: rgyal po shin tu zas skom gyi rang bzhin can ni /

original: 'chums nas g-yeng bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chums nas g-yeng bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gsum pa 'gengs par byed pa la shin tu phyogs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: zas dang skom gnyis las ma gtogs pa don gzhan rnams la de'i blo 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
