analyzed: sred pa'i rnam par g-yeng ba des 'jig rten pa'i don rnams kyi'ang bar du gcod par byed par 'gyur ba yin pa dang / zas dang skom nye bar sten par gyur pas ji ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams la yang rnam par gshe bar gyur pa yin no //🔽'di lta ste /
translated: And by that distraction of craving, he will be obstructed from even worldly aims, and by his attachment to food and drink, he will be reviled even by the supramundane.

original: shin tu kho na'ang zas skom la sred par gyur pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa de la yid srong bar gyur pa de'i ngang tshul can dag ni rtag par yang ro'i sred pas kun tu khrid par byed pas yid mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin par 'gyur ro
analyzed: shin tu kho na'ang zas skom la sred par gyur pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa de la yid srong bar gyur pa de'i ngang tshul can dag ni rtag par yang ro'i sred pas kun tu khrid par byed pas yid mnyam par bzhag pa ma yin par 'gyur ro
translated: Those who are very attached to food and drink, who are of a nature that is attached to food and drink, who are of a disposition that is attached to food and drink, are always led around by craving for tastes. Their minds are not in meditative equipoise.

original: // lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa dag med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: // lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa dag med par 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not have mindfulness related to the body.

original: tshor bar gtogs pa'ang med do //
analyzed: tshor bar gtogs pa'ang med do //
translated: They do not have mindfulness related to feelings.

original: sems su gtogs pa dag kyang med do //
analyzed: sems su gtogs pa dag kyang med do //
translated: They do not have mindfulness related to the mind.

original: chos su gtogs pa dag kyang med do //
analyzed: chos su gtogs pa dag kyang med do //
translated: They do not have mindfulness related to dharmas.

original: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam gyis bsdus pa rnams kyang med do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam gyis bsdus pa rnams kyang med do //
translated: They do not have mindfulness related to the four noble truths, which are included in the truths of suffering, origination, cessation, and the path.

original: zas dang skom la gud par 'gyur ba las ma gtogs pa 'di dag don gzhan rnams 'ga' zhig la'ang blo las su rung @425a *//🔽bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zas dang skom la gud par 'gyur ba las ma gtogs pa 'di dag don gzhan rnams 'ga' zhig la'ang blo las su rung @425a *// bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Except for being attached to food and drink, their minds are not fit for any other purpose.

original: de ni / dud 'gro dang rang bzhin mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni / dud 'gro dang rang bzhin mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: They are like animals.

original: de zas dang skom gyi spyod yul rnams las zas la rnam par spyod pa'i brtson pa de dag las grol ba ni /
analyzed: de zas dang skom gyi spyod yul rnams las zas la rnam par spyod pa'i brtson pa de dag las grol ba ni /
translated: He is free from the effort of consuming food and drink.

original: lus ngag gi spyod pas bsdus pa dang dbang po rnams kyang yang dag par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus ngag gi spyod pas bsdus pa dang dbang po rnams kyang yang dag par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro //
translated: His body and speech are collected, and his faculties are fully ripened.

original: yang dag pa'i lam rnams spyod par byed do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i lam rnams spyod par byed do //
translated: He practices the right path.

original: de'i sems las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i sems las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: His mind becomes workable.

original: lus dang sems dang tshor ba dang chos rnams dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams ma lus pa shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus dang sems dang tshor ba dang chos rnams dang sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam rnams ma lus pa shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He has knowledge of the body, mind, feelings, phenomena, suffering, origination, cessation, and path.

original: de'i yid shin tu mnyam par 'gyur ba dang sems dang dbang po rnams kyang rab tu dang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i yid shin tu mnyam par 'gyur ba dang sems dang dbang po rnams kyang rab tu dang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: His mind becomes very even, and his mind and faculties become clear.

original: zas dang skom dang ldan pa'i lus ni /
analyzed: zas dang skom dang ldan pa'i lus ni /
translated: His body, which is endowed with food and drink,

original: yang dag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang dag par 'gyur te /
translated: becomes right.

original: lus rang bzhin du gnas pa dang sems rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / sems rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa yin pa gang gi phyir yang dge ba'i chos rnams bsam par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: lus rang bzhin du gnas pa dang sems rang bzhin du gnas pa dang / sems rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa yin pa gang gi phyir yang dge ba'i chos rnams bsam par nus pa yin no //
translated: The body is at ease, the mind is at ease, and the mind is in a state of ease.

original: de'i phyir na rol sred pa la ched cher 'gyur bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na rol sred pa la ched cher 'gyur bar mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not be overly concerned with sensual pleasures.

original: gal te zas sam skom mam lus la 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe 'grangs pa tsam dang phan pa tsam zhig goms par byas pas de ltar 'di'i yid las su rung ba dang sems mnyam par bzhag par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te zas sam skom mam lus la 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe 'grangs pa tsam dang phan pa tsam zhig goms par byas pas de ltar 'di'i yid las su rung ba dang sems mnyam par bzhag par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If one eats or drinks in a way that is beneficial and moderate, then one’s mind will become fit and one’s mind will become concentrated.

original: sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag par gyur pa rnams ni /
analyzed: sems shin tu mnyam par bzhag par gyur pa rnams ni /
translated: When the mind is well concentrated,

original: dge ba'i las la dpyod par byed do //
analyzed: dge ba'i las la dpyod par byed do //
translated: one will be able to examine virtuous actions.

original: dge @425b pa'i las rnams kyi mtha' la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: dge @425b pa'i las rnams kyi mtha' la spyod pa ni /
translated: One who practices virtuous actions

original: lus zhig par gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu las de dang de dag gi dri tsam gyis kyang 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
analyzed: lus zhig par gyur nas shi ba'i 'og tu las de dang de dag gi dri tsam gyis kyang 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu 'gyur te /
translated: will, when the body comes to an end and after death, become the lord of the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife by the mere scent of those actions.

original: las de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis so; ;chos gzhan yang rgyal pos byas par bya'o //
analyzed: las de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis so; ;chos gzhan yang rgyal pos byas par bya'o //
translated: “ ‘There is another factor that a king should create.

original: 'di'ang gang zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di'ang gang zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: What is it?

original: legs par spyod par bya ba rnams sems par byed pa'o //
analyzed: legs par spyod par bya ba rnams sems par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the thought of what is well done.

original: legs par bsam par bya ba rnams sems par byed pa'ang gang gi phyir 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma ma yin yang sems can rnams kyi don sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: legs par bsam par bya ba rnams sems par byed pa'ang gang gi phyir 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma ma yin yang sems can rnams kyi don sgrub par byed do //
translated: Even if it is not for this world or the next, it accomplishes the aims of beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems kyi yon tan yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sems kyi yon tan yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is a mental quality.

original: gang dag gis 'di dang pha rol tu'ang legs par bsam par bya ba rnams sems pa po ni /
analyzed: gang dag gis 'di dang pha rol tu'ang legs par bsam par bya ba rnams sems pa po ni /
translated: Those who think of what is well done in this world and the next

original: mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will be supremely happy.

original: 'on kyang skyon rnams rab tu gzhom par bya zhing des legs par bsam par bya ba rnams bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang skyon rnams rab tu gzhom par bya zhing des legs par bsam par bya ba rnams bsam par bya'o //
translated: However, one should overcome faults and think of what is well done.

original: yid la'ang gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: yid la'ang gzhag par bya'o //
translated: One should also keep it in mind.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams kyang rtag par ngan song du rnam par 'jug par byed pa yin par brjod par bya'o //🔽'dod chags la ni; mi sdug pas so //🔽zhe sdang la ni /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma rnams kyang rtag par ngan song du rnam par 'jug par byed pa yin par brjod par bya'o // 'dod chags la ni; mi sdug pas so // zhe sdang la ni /
translated: The defilements of desire and so on are said to always lead to the lower realms.🔽Desire is overcome by the contemplation of impurity.

original: byams pas so //🔽gti mug la ni /
analyzed: byams pas so // gti mug la ni /
translated: Hatred is overcome by the contemplation of loving kindness.

original: shes rab kyis so //
analyzed: shes rab kyis so //
translated: Delusion is overcome by the contemplation of wisdom.

original: de la dri ma rnam pa gsum po de dag rnams ni /
analyzed: de la dri ma rnam pa gsum po de dag rnams ni /
translated: The three kinds of defilements

original: legs par bsam pa sems pas zad par bya bar nus so //🔽ngan par bsam pa sems par byed pa de dag rnams kyis ni /
analyzed: legs par bsam pa sems pas zad par bya bar nus so // ngan par bsam pa sems par byed pa de dag rnams kyis ni /
translated: can be overcome by contemplating the good.

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: But not by contemplating the bad.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyang de kho na bzhin du legs par bsam pa sems par byed pa rnams @426a *//🔽kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //🔽ngan par bsam pa sems par byed pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyang de kho na bzhin du legs par bsam pa sems par byed pa rnams @426a *// kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro // ngan par bsam pa sems par byed pa ni /
translated: The worldly dharmas are also like this: they are accomplished by contemplating the good.

original: mi yin no //
analyzed: mi yin no //
translated: But not by contemplating the bad.

original: de'i phyir thams cad kyis gnas skabs thams cad du don thams cad legs par bsam la bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad kyis gnas skabs thams cad du don thams cad legs par bsam la bya'o //
translated: Therefore, in all situations, one should do everything by contemplating the good.

original: de las 'di'i don kun 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / chos pa'i lus zhig par gyur nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur te; ;las bzang po de'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de las 'di'i don kun 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / chos pa'i lus zhig par gyur nas kyang mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur te; ;las bzang po de'i rgyu dang rkyen rnams kyis so //
translated: By this, all his aims will be accomplished, and when his life as a Dharma practitioner comes to an end, he will become the lord of the gods in the joyous higher realms.

original: chos gzhan yang rgyal pos mi bya'o //
analyzed: chos gzhan yang rgyal pos mi bya'o //
translated: “ ‘There is another quality that a king should not pursue.

original: 'di'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows.🔽The pursuit of distant goals is a worldly pursuit.

original: don thag ring bar gyur ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten pa'i don rnams sgrub pa pa; ;'jig rten 'das pa'i yang ste /
analyzed: don thag ring bar gyur ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten pa'i don rnams sgrub pa pa; ;'jig rten 'das pa'i yang ste /
translated: It is also a supramundane pursuit,

original: phan pa'i don gang byed par gyur pa dang / gzhan dag rnams kyang byed par gyur pa na dus ring pos kyang bya bar mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: phan pa'i don gang byed par gyur pa dang / gzhan dag rnams kyang byed par gyur pa na dus ring pos kyang bya bar mi nus pa'o //
translated: but it is a pursuit that is not accomplished by those who are not patient, even if they work for a long time.

original: de dag la mi bzod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag la mi bzod par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not be patient with it.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: What is that?

original: nad kyis kyang myur bar kun tu bcom par gyur ba na don thag ring bar gyur pa'i skyon gyis bsgrub byar gyur pa rnams kyang bsgrub bya ma yin par byas nas chud gzon par byed do //
analyzed: nad kyis kyang myur bar kun tu bcom par gyur ba na don thag ring bar gyur pa'i skyon gyis bsgrub byar gyur pa rnams kyang bsgrub bya ma yin par byas nas chud gzon par byed do //
translated: When the body is quickly overcome by disease, the faults of distant goals make the attainable unattainable and cause loss.

original: de bzhin du don gzhan dag du ma rnams kyang myur bar ma byas pas dus gzhan du shin tu'ang bzod par mi nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du don gzhan dag du ma rnams kyang myur bar ma byas pas dus gzhan du shin tu'ang bzod par mi nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, many other goals are not quickly accomplished, and later they become impossible to bear.

original: de ltar nges par legs par lam cung zad tsam yang med de /
analyzed: de ltar nges par legs par lam cung zad tsam yang med de /
translated: Thus, there is no path of definite goodness at all.

original: nad lta bur gyur pa'i nyon mongs pas rjes su bcom par gyur pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: nad lta bur gyur pa'i nyon mongs pas rjes su bcom par gyur pas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
translated: One is overcome by the disease-like afflictions and goes to the lower realms.

original: don thag ring bar 'gyur ba'i skyon gyis yin te /
analyzed: don thag ring bar 'gyur ba'i skyon gyis yin te /
translated: This is due to the fault of distant goals.

original: de'i tshe 'jig @426b rten las 'das pa'i lam cung zad tsam yang med do //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'jig @426b rten las 'das pa'i lam cung zad tsam yang med do //
translated: At that time, there is not even a trace of the supramundane path.

original: lam rnams rjes su nye bar 'joms par 'gyur bas dug gi myug gu dang cha 'dra bar gyur pa rnam par 'phel bar gyur nas dus gzhan du rab tu 'phel bar zhugs nas rgyud ma rungs pa sreg par byed de /
analyzed: lam rnams rjes su nye bar 'joms par 'gyur bas dug gi myug gu dang cha 'dra bar gyur pa rnam par 'phel bar gyur nas dus gzhan du rab tu 'phel bar zhugs nas rgyud ma rungs pa sreg par byed de /
translated: At another time, it grows and spreads, and the evil mind-stream is burned.

original: gang gis srog chags rnams dmyal ba dang yi dvags dud 'gro'i skye bar 'gyur bar byed do //
analyzed: gang gis srog chags rnams dmyal ba dang yi dvags dud 'gro'i skye bar 'gyur bar byed do //
translated: By this, living beings are born in the hells, as hungry ghosts, and as animals.

original: de'i phyir don thag ring ba ni rgyal po'am de ma yin pa dge slong rnams sam /
analyzed: de'i phyir don thag ring ba ni rgyal po'am de ma yin pa dge slong rnams sam /
translated: Therefore, the far-reaching aim is not pleasing to the king, or to the monks,

original: nor can rnams sam /🔽'ga' zhig la'ang snyan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nor can rnams sam / 'ga' zhig la'ang snyan pa ma yin no //
translated: or to the wealthy,🔽or to anyone.

original: thams cad la shin tu bar yang bsngags pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad la shin tu bar yang bsngags pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not praised by anyone.

original: gang yang don thag ring bar gyur pa ma yin pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang yang don thag ring bar gyur pa ma yin pa de dag ni /
translated: But those who have a near-reaching aim🔽are destroyed in an instant.

original: skyon skyes par gyur pa dag skad cig gi dus der sgyur bar byed do //🔽gtong bar byed do //🔽kun nas 'joms par byed do //🔽rab tu 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: skyon skyes par gyur pa dag skad cig gi dus der sgyur bar byed do // gtong bar byed do // kun nas 'joms par byed do // rab tu 'joms par byed do //
translated: They are abandoned.🔽They are completely destroyed.

original: rtsa ba nas rlag par byed do //
analyzed: rtsa ba nas rlag par byed do //
translated: They are utterly destroyed.🔽They are completely annihilated.

original: des skyon de dag rnams kun nas bcom par gyur pas mthar thug par bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des skyon de dag rnams kun nas bcom par gyur pas mthar thug par bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having completely destroyed all those faults, he will finally be happy.

original: skyes bu 'jig rten pa 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la'ang gnas nas kun tu skyes pa'i skyon rnams 'joms par byed do //
analyzed: skyes bu 'jig rten pa 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la'ang gnas nas kun tu skyes pa'i skyon rnams 'joms par byed do //
translated: Whether he is on the mundane or supramundane path, he will destroy the faults that arise.

original: dug gi myug gu dang 'dra ba'i skyon yang dus gzhan du 'phel nas skyon mang por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dug gi myug gu dang 'dra ba'i skyon yang dus gzhan du 'phel nas skyon mang por 'gyur ro //
translated: Like a poisonous plant, the faults will grow and increase over time and become more and more harmful.

original: de'i phyir gang dag gis skad cig de la skyon rnams gzhom par byas la rings par byas te yang bde legs kyi gnas la legs par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang dag gis skad cig de la skyon rnams gzhom par byas la rings par byas te yang bde legs kyi gnas la legs par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should quickly destroy the faults in that moment and apply oneself to the state of well-being.

original: mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten @427a *//
analyzed: mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu mtho ris bde 'gro'i 'jig rten @427a *//
translated: When the body that is the basis of the experience of the world perishes, after death, he will go to the joyous higher realms,

original: 'thab bral ba rnams la dbang bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'thab bral ba rnams la dbang bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: and become a lord among the gods in the Heaven Free from Strife.

original: des sngon byas pa'i legs par byas pa'i las de nyid kyi rgyu dang rkyen rnams las yin no //
analyzed: des sngon byas pa'i legs par byas pa'i las de nyid kyi rgyu dang rkyen rnams las yin no //
translated: This is due to the causes and conditions of his own previous good actions.

original: chos gzhan yang rgyal pos bya bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos gzhan yang rgyal pos bya bar bya'o //
translated: “The king should also do the following:

original: 'di'ang gang dag zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'ang gang dag zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: chos kyis skye rgu rnams bskyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyis skye rgu rnams bskyang bar bya'o //
translated: He should protect living beings through the Dharma.

original: gang gi phyir rgyal po gang dag chos kyis skye rgu rnams bskyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rgyal po gang dag chos kyis skye rgu rnams bskyang bar bya'o //
translated: Because the king should protect living beings through the Dharma,

original: chos ma yin pas ni; ma yin no //
analyzed: chos ma yin pas ni; ma yin no //
translated: not through non-Dharma.

original: chos kyis lhag pa'i rgyal po'i yang bdag dang gzhan la phan par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyis lhag pa'i rgyal po'i yang bdag dang gzhan la phan par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: The king who is superior through the Dharma will benefit both himself and others.

original: bdag la phan pa ma yin pa mi byed do //
analyzed: bdag la phan pa ma yin pa mi byed do //
translated: He will not do what is not beneficial for himself.

original: ji srid du tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be endowed with moral discipline.

original: tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa rnams ni /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur pa rnams ni /
translated: Those who are endowed with moral discipline

original: chos ma yin pas nam yang skye rgu skyong bar mi byed do //
analyzed: chos ma yin pas nam yang skye rgu skyong bar mi byed do //
translated: will never protect living beings through non-Dharma.

original: de ltar bdag la phan pa byed do //
analyzed: de ltar bdag la phan pa byed do //
translated: In this way, he will benefit himself.

original: ji ltar yang gzhan la phan pa byed pa yin na; srog chags su gyur pa gang dag kyang chos pa ma yin zhing chos kyi rjes su yongs su 'jug pa'ang ma yin pa /
analyzed: ji ltar yang gzhan la phan pa byed pa yin na; srog chags su gyur pa gang dag kyang chos pa ma yin zhing chos kyi rjes su yongs su 'jug pa'ang ma yin pa /
translated: How will he benefit others? He will benefit those living beings who are not righteous and do not follow the Dharma.

original: de dag rnams 'dis bde legs la rab tu sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: de dag rnams 'dis bde legs la rab tu sbyor bar byed do //
translated: They will all be devoted to his well-being.

original: de ltar yang dag pa skye rgu skyong bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang dag pa skye rgu skyong bar byed pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, he will become a true protector of living beings.

original: bskyangs par gyur pa las kyang chos dang don dang snyan pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bskyangs par gyur pa las kyang chos dang don dang snyan pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: And because he is a protector, he will be endowed with Dharma, purpose, and beauty.

original: re zhig dang por chos kyis ni /
analyzed: re zhig dang por chos kyis ni /
translated: First, he will be endowed with Dharma.

original: mchog tu nges par legs pa la yang dag par sbyor bar gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: mchog tu nges par legs pa la yang dag par sbyor bar gyur pa yin na /
translated: He will be devoted to the highest form of goodness.

original: ji ltar na chos ma yin pa dang kun nas ldan par gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar na chos ma yin pa dang kun nas ldan par gyur /
translated: How could he be endowed with non-Dharma?

original: rgyal po don dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyal po don dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur te /
translated: The king will be endowed with purpose.

original: ji @427b lta bu'i don gyis she na /
analyzed: ji @427b lta bu'i don gyis she na /
translated: What is that purpose?

original: 'di lta ste /
